text: Roshan has fallen to the Dire.

text: Roshan has been killed by the Dire.

name: ann_glados_roshan_fallen_dire_03
text: Roshan-bestselling novelist, avid fly fisherman, proud father of three-has just been murdered by the Dire. I hope they're proud of themselves.
text_simple: roshanbestselling novelist avid fly fisherman proud father of threehas just been murdered by the dire i hope theyre proud of themselves

name: ann_glados_roshan_fallen_dire_04
text: Roshan, who was just minding his own business, has been callously murdered by the Dire.
text_simple: roshan who was just minding his own business has been callously murdered by the dire

name: ann_glados_roshan_fallen_rad_01
text: Roshan has fallen to the Radiant.
text_simple: roshan has fallen to the radiant

name: ann_glados_roshan_fallen_rad_02
text: Roshan has been murdered by the Radiant. I guess we know who the real monster was all along.
text_simple: roshan has been murdered by the radiant i guess we know who the real monster was all along

name: ann_glados_roshan_fallen_rad_03
text: Roshan has been killed by the Radiant.
text_simple: roshan has been killed by the radiant

name: ann_glados_roshan_fallen_rad_04

text: You won.

name: ann_glados_victory_dire_01
text: Dire victory.
text_simple: dire victory

name: ann_glados_victory_dire_02
text: Victory for Dire.
text_simple: victory for dire

name: ann_glados_victory_dire_03
text: Victory goes to Dire.
text_simple: victory goes to dire

name: ann_glados_victory_dire_long_01
text: Dire did not lose as badly as Radiant, and is technically the winner.
text_simple: dire did not lose as badly as radiant and is technically the winner

name: ann_glados_victory_rad_01
text: Radiant victory.
text_simple: radiant victory

name: ann_glados_victory_rad_02
text: Victory for Radiant.
text_simple: victory for radiant

name: ann_glados_victory_rad_03
text: Victory goes to Radiant.
text_simple: victory goes to radiant

name: ann_glados_victory_rad_long_01
text: Radiant performed marginally less poorly than Dire and is, I suppose, the winner.
text_simple: radiant performed marginally less poorly than dire and is i suppose the winner

name: ann_glados_vict_follow_01
text: Wait until your loved ones hear about this. This should make them proud. Or bored. One of those.
text_simple: wait until your loved ones hear about this this should make them proud or bored one of those

name: ann_glados_vict_follow_02
text: Well, really there should be an entirely new word for whatever it was you just stumbled and pinwheeled your arms through. But I guess for now let's call it winning.
text_simple: well really there should be an entirely new word for whatever it was you just stumbled and pinwheeled your arms through but i guess for now lets call it winning

name: ann_glados_vict_follow_03
text: All your little goblins destroyed a magic whatever-it-was in the middle of a forest. That's quite a skill you have. If I were you I'd wait by the mailbox for my big check.
text_simple: all your little goblins destroyed a magic whateveritwas in the middle of a forest thats quite a skill you have if i were you id wait by the mailbox for my big check

name: ann_glados_vict_follow_04
text: I was going to say it's not that big a deal, but then I looked at your file and saw the list of your other accomplishements. The space on the form where they should have been, I mean.
text_simple: i was going to say its not that big a deal but then i looked at your file and saw the list of your other accomplishements the space on the form where they should have been i mean

name: ann_glados_vict_follow_05
text: Congratulations. You solved Dota. You are the best hero. Turn off your computer now.
text_simple: congratulations you solved dota you are the best hero turn off your computer now

name: ann_glados_prelim_01
text: Welcome to Dota.
text_simple: welcome to dota

name: ann_glados_prelim_02
text: Well, look who's come crawling back.
text_simple: well look whos come crawling back

name: ann_glados_prelim_03
text: Oh, it's you.
text_simple: oh its you

name: ann_glados_prelim_04
text: This is Dota.
text_simple: this is dota

name: ann_glados_prelim_05
text: Oh good, you're back.
text_simple: oh good youre back

name: ann_glados_prelim_06
text: Welcome to Ota. The D is silent.
text_simple: welcome to ota the d is silent

name: ann_glados_prelim_07
text: Hello.
text_simple: hello

name: ann_glados_prelim_08
text: You're back. You must really enjoy crushing defeat.
text_simple: youre back you must really enjoy crushing defeat

name: ann_glados_prelim_10
text: Today is a good day to die in a forest defending a statue from goblins.
text_simple: today is a good day to die in a forest defending a statue from goblins

name: ann_glados_prelim_11
text: Hello. I hope you're ready this time.
text_simple: hello i hope youre ready this time

name: ann_glados_prelim_12
text: You must be the one the others were talking about. The-well, I'm sure you'll do fine.
text_simple: you must be the one the others were talking about thewell im sure youll do fine

name: ann_glados_prelim_13
text: You must be the one the others were talking about. That talent-less one.
text_simple: you must be the one the others were talking about that talentless one

name: ann_glados_prelim_14
text: Welcome to Dota. It's the hot new game you've been reading about in your eating magazines.
text_simple: welcome to dota its the hot new game youve been reading about in your eating magazines

name: ann_glados_prelim_15
text: Welcome to Dota. Don't forget your little plastic sword. And all your chins. And your giant flagon of gravy.
text_simple: welcome to dota dont forget your little plastic sword and all your chins and your giant flagon of gravy

name: ann_glados_prelim_16
text: Welcome to Medieval Times. How many in your party tonight?
text_simple: welcome to medieval times how many in your party tonight

name: ann_glados_prelim_17
text: Welcome to Dota. It's like chess with one piece and a forest.
text_simple: welcome to dota its like chess with one piece and a forest

name: ann_glados_prelim_19
text: You must be the one the others were talking about. The one with all the chins.
text_simple: you must be the one the others were talking about the one with all the chins

name: ann_glados_prelim_20
text: Welcome to Dota.

text: All pick.

text: Mid only.

text_simple: all random

text_simple: captains mode

name: ann_glados_gamemode_12
text: You're not going to like this one.
text_simple: youre not going to like this one

name: ann_glados_gamemode_14
text: Oh good, something new to fail at.
text_simple: oh good something new to fail at

name: ann_glados_gamemode_15
text: This is new.
text_simple: this is new

name: ann_glados_gamemode_16
text: This looks challenging. For you, I mean.
text_simple: this looks challenging for you i mean

name: ann_glados_gamemode_17
text: I don't want to tell you your business, but if it were me I'd leave this new game mode alone.
text_simple: i dont want to tell you your business but if it were me id leave this new game mode alone

name: ann_glados_gamemode_18
text: I wouldn't bother with this mode. My guess is that just clicking it will make your life even worse somehow.
text_simple: i wouldnt bother with this mode my guess is that just clicking it will make your life even worse somehow

name: ann_glados_gamemode_19
text: I was getting bored watching you lose in those other modes anyway.
text_simple: i was getting bored watching you lose in those other modes anyway

name: ann_glados_spectat_01
text: Don't wear out the edge of your seat.
text_simple: dont wear out the edge of your seat

name: ann_glados_spectat_03
text: Gripping, isn't it?
text_simple: gripping isnt it

name: ann_glados_spectat_04
text: You paid for the whole seat, so get comfortable because it looks like we may be here a long time.
text_simple: you paid for the whole seat so get comfortable because it looks like we may be here a long time

name: ann_glados_spectat_05
text: I know, I can't wait either.
text_simple: i know i cant wait either

name: ann_glados_spectat_06
text: Here's a Dota play-by-play. That fat, batwinged thing just flew left. A goblin punched a... ghost I think. Good for him. Good for everyone. Anyway: Dota.
text_simple: heres a dota playbyplay that fat batwinged thing just flew left a goblin punched a ghost i think good for him good for everyone anyway dota

name: ann_glados_spectat_07
text: So, what's happening here then? Oh! The game's still on. Gripping, isn't it?
text_simple: so whats happening here then oh the games still on gripping isnt it

name: ann_glados_spectat_09
text: I spy with my robot eye something that makes no sense. Did you guess everything that's going on here? Because this is all nonsense.
text_simple: i spy with my robot eye something that makes no sense did you guess everything thats going on here because this is all nonsense

name: ann_glados_event_neg_23
text: The game already started, by the way. I wasn't sure if you were waiting for a whistle. There isn't one.
text_simple: the game already started by the way i wasnt sure if you were waiting for a whistle there isnt one

name: ann_glados_mia_bot_01
text: The bottom lane is missing.
text_simple: the bottom lane is missing

name: ann_glados_mia_bot_02
text: Bottom is missing.
text_simple: bottom is missing

name: ann_glados_mia_mid_01
text: The middle lane is missing.
text_simple: the middle lane is missing

name: ann_glados_mia_mid_02
text: Middle is missing.
text_simple: middle is missing

name: ann_glados_mia_top_01
text: The top lane is missing.
text_simple: the top lane is missing

name: ann_glados_mia_top_02
text: Top is missing.
text_simple: top is missing

name: ann_glados_ally_neg_01
text: Thanks to you.
text_simple: thanks to you

name: ann_glados_ally_neg_02
text: That's bad, by the way.
text_simple: thats bad by the way

name: ann_glados_ally_neg_04
text: I honestly, truly didn't think you'd allow that to happen.
text_simple: i honestly truly didnt think youd allow that to happen

name: ann_glados_ally_neg_05
text: You're allowed to defend those, you know.
text_simple: youre allowed to defend those you know

name: ann_glados_ally_neg_06
text: Because of poor decisions. Yours most likely.
text_simple: because of poor decisions yours most likely

name: ann_glados_ally_neg_08
text: Because someone-I'm talking about you here-doesn't know what they're doing.
text_simple: because someoneim talking about you heredoesnt know what theyre doing

name: ann_glados_ally_neg_10
text: What counts is that you tried, so maybe do that next time.
text_simple: what counts is that you tried so maybe do that next time

name: ann_glados_ally_neg_11
text: There are no handicaps on this match by the way. You can stop them from doing that.
text_simple: there are no handicaps on this match by the way you can stop them from doing that

name: ann_glados_ally_neg_12
text: If you were saving your real strategy for a crisis, now would be the time.
text_simple: if you were saving your real strategy for a crisis now would be the time

name: ann_glados_ally_neg_13
text: That outfit you're wearing looks stupid. That's not me talking. It's right here in your file.
text_simple: that outfit youre wearing looks stupid thats not me talking its right here in your file

name: ann_glados_ally_neg_14
text: When other people play that hero it looks fine. But right here a scientist has noted that when you play it looks stupid.
text_simple: when other people play that hero it looks fine but right here a scientist has noted that when you play it looks stupid

name: ann_glados_ally_neg_15
text: Grief counseling will be available at the conclusion of the match.
text_simple: grief counseling will be available at the conclusion of the match

name: ann_glados_ally_neg_16
text: But on the bright side, I just won. Money. Gambling money. By betting against you.
text_simple: but on the bright side i just won money gambling money by betting against you

name: ann_glados_ally_neg_17
text: But we're all winners here. Especially those players over there. In the enemy camp. You know, the ones celebrating.
text_simple: but were all winners here especially those players over there in the enemy camp you know the ones celebrating

name: ann_glados_ally_neg_18
text: Interesting stategy. Let them obliterate all your defenses, then swoop in for the kill.
text_simple: interesting stategy let them obliterate all your defenses then swoop in for the kill

name: ann_glados_ally_neg_19
text: That doesn't mean you have to like it. It just means you'll probably keep doing it because of your aptitude at failure.
text_simple: that doesnt mean you have to like it it just means youll probably keep doing it because of your aptitude at failure

name: ann_glados_ally_neg_20
text: But don't worry, losing builds character. In fact it's making you a better person right now. A great, big, well-rounded loser with lots of personality.
text_simple: but dont worry losing builds character in fact its making you a better person right now a great big wellrounded loser with lots of personality

name: ann_glados_ally_neg_21
text: But looking at it another way, I think you've won a real moral victory here. Which doesn't mean we should forget about the first way. The more accurate and humiliating way.
text_simple: but looking at it another way i think youve won a real moral victory here which doesnt mean we should forget about the first way the more accurate and humiliating way

name: ann_glados_ally_neg_22
text: But it's not a big loss really. It's one in a series of very small losses over a 45 minute timespan that, when added up, will look like one big, spectacular failure.
text_simple: but its not a big loss really its one in a series of very small losses over a 45 minute timespan that when added up will look like one big spectacular failure

name: ann_glados_ally_neg_23
text: Well nobody will hold it against you. Let's be honest, I doubt anyone will even find it surprising.
text_simple: well nobody will hold it against you lets be honest i doubt anyone will even find it surprising

name: ann_glados_ally_neg_24
text: Now you're really in for it.
text_simple: now youre really in for it

name: ann_glados_ally_neg_26
text: I can't even begin to describe how badly you've screwed this up. Oh wait, I just did.
text_simple: i cant even begin to describe how badly youve screwed this up oh wait i just did

name: ann_glados_ally_neg_28
text: If I was a betting artificial intelligence, I'd put money on them killing you now.
text_simple: if i was a betting artificial intelligence id put money on them killing you now

name: ann_glados_ally_neg_29
text: That's bad, by the way.
text_simple: thats bad by the way

name: ann_glados_ally_neg_30
text: That doesn't mean you have to like it.
text_simple: that doesnt mean you have to like it

name: ann_glados_neutral_followup_01
text: This should be interesting.
text_simple: this should be interesting

name: ann_glados_neutral_followup_02
text: I was on the edge of my seat.
text_simple: i was on the edge of my seat

name: ann_glados_neutral_followup_05
text: Let's watch and see what happens.
text_simple: lets watch and see what happens

name: ann_glados_neutral_followup_08
text: Good.
text_simple: good

name: ann_glados_neutral_followup_10
text: In case you weren't paying attention.
text_simple: in case you werent paying attention

name: ann_glados_event_neg_01
text: If that's something you cared about.
text_simple: if thats something you cared about

name: ann_glados_event_neg_02
text: It's probably nothing to worry about.
text_simple: its probably nothing to worry about

name: ann_glados_event_neg_03
text: You might want to look into that.
text_simple: you might want to look into that

name: ann_glados_event_neg_04
text: So there's that.
text_simple: so theres that

name: ann_glados_event_neg_05
text: You're allowed to start trying now.
text_simple: youre allowed to start trying now

name: ann_glados_event_neg_06
text: But you probably already knew that.
text_simple: but you probably already knew that

name: ann_glados_event_neg_07
text: Not that I care one way or the other.
text_simple: not that i care one way or the other

name: ann_glados_event_neg_08
text: So that's something that's happening.
text_simple: so thats something thats happening

name: ann_glados_event_neg_09
text: But just continue doing whatever it was you were doing.
text_simple: but just continue doing whatever it was you were doing

name: ann_glados_event_neg_11
text: I hope that's part of your plan.
text_simple: i hope thats part of your plan

name: ann_glados_event_neg_12
text: You don't even care, do you?
text_simple: you dont even care do you

name: ann_glados_event_neg_13
text: It'll probably be fine.
text_simple: itll probably be fine

name: ann_glados_event_neg_15
text: Is this part of an elaborate trap you're going to spring on them later? Because it looks like they're really falling for it.
text_simple: is this part of an elaborate trap youre going to spring on them later because it looks like theyre really falling for it

name: ann_glados_event_neg_16
text: I know it's not a plate of nachos or anything, but it is important to the game.
text_simple: i know its not a plate of nachos or anything but it is important to the game

name: ann_glados_event_neg_17
text: It's probably fine. Trust me: I'm a super-computer and I barely understand what's happening right now.
text_simple: its probably fine trust me im a supercomputer and i barely understand whats happening right now

name: ann_glados_event_neg_18
text: I only mention it as a conversation starter. How are you doing otherwise?
text_simple: i only mention it as a conversation starter how are you doing otherwise

name: ann_glados_event_neg_19
text: Let me put it in old English so that it will penetrate your wizard's cap: thou art losing.
text_simple: let me put it in old english so that it will penetrate your wizards cap thou art losing

name: ann_glados_event_neg_20
text: You're really losing now. Or winning. Well, back to my mad-libs.
text_simple: youre really losing now or winning well back to my madlibs

name: ann_glados_event_neg_21
text: Wait, maybe they're not actually damaging it. No, they are.
text_simple: wait maybe theyre not actually damaging it no they are

name: ann_glados_event_neg_22
text: I know. I don't care either.
text_simple: i know i dont care either

name: ann_glados_event_neg_25
text: This is the hardest part about being an impartial announcer: balancing how little I care about anything that's happening here.
text_simple: this is the hardest part about being an impartial announcer balancing how little i care about anything thats happening here

name: ann_glados_neutral_followup_04
text: Bad news for you fans of towers out there.
text_simple: bad news for you fans of towers out there

name: ann_glados_spectat_02
text: Yes, yes. Oh that was a great mad-lib. So, what's happening here then?
text_simple: yes yes oh that was a great madlib so whats happening here then

name: ann_glados_ally_pos_01
text: Don't get cocky.
text_simple: dont get cocky

name: ann_glados_ally_pos_02
text: Don't let it go to your fat, jowly head.
text_simple: dont let it go to your fat jowly head

name: ann_glados_ally_pos_03
text: Don't let it go to your giant, misshapen fantasy head.
text_simple: dont let it go to your giant misshapen fantasy head

name: ann_glados_ally_pos_04
text: So at least your teammates know what they're doing.
text_simple: so at least your teammates know what theyre doing

name: ann_glados_ally_pos_05
text: You're winning the epic battle for this small field with a creek running through it.
text_simple: youre winning the epic battle for this small field with a creek running through it

name: ann_glados_ally_pos_07
text: Here, let me engrave a trophy for you: nobody cares.
text_simple: here let me engrave a trophy for you nobody cares

name: ann_glados_ally_pos_08
text: If this backward, illiterate fantasy forest had a newspaper, you'd be on the front page.
text_simple: if this backward illiterate fantasy forest had a newspaper youd be on the front page

name: ann_glados_ally_pos_09
text: Let me record this victory in your file. Where did I put it? Oh, who cares.
text_simple: let me record this victory in your file where did i put it oh who cares

name: ann_glados_ally_pos_10
text: Your teammates are doing a really great job.
text_simple: your teammates are doing a really great job

name: ann_glados_ally_pos_11
text: They're just going to build another one. They're made of cement. You can buy them at the supermarket.
text_simple: theyre just going to build another one theyre made of cement you can buy them at the supermarket

name: ann_glados_ally_pos_13
text: This should impress all the people who doubted you at the comic book store.
text_simple: this should impress all the people who doubted you at the comic book store

name: ann_glados_ally_pos_15
text: Why don't you celebrate with two fistfulls of potatochips once you've swallowed the chips you're probably eating now.
text_simple: why dont you celebrate with two fistfulls of potatochips once youve swallowed the chips youre probably eating now

name: ann_glados_ally_pos_16
text: This is probably the most heroic thing anyone's ever done while sitting motionless in their parents' rec room.
text_simple: this is probably the most heroic thing anyones ever done while sitting motionless in their parents rec room

name: ann_glados_ally_pos_17
text: You must be so proud of your teammates right now.
text_simple: you must be so proud of your teammates right now

name: ann_glados_ally_pos_18
text: You were almost helpful that time.
text_simple: you were almost helpful that time

name: ann_glados_ally_pos_19
text: Well, you offered moral support.
text_simple: well you offered moral support

name: ann_glados_ally_pos_20
text: It's a good feeling, isn't it? I wouldn't get used to it.
text_simple: its a good feeling isnt it i wouldnt get used to it

name: ann_glados_ally_pos_21
text: Not bad. Not as bad, I mean, as your other decisions so far.
text_simple: not bad not as bad i mean as your other decisions so far

name: ann_glados_ally_pos_22
text: Well, that's probably the game. You win. Hands off the keyboard.
text_simple: well thats probably the game you win hands off the keyboard

name: ann_glados_ally_pos_23
text: Well, aren't you the little hero of the forest.
text_simple: well arent you the little hero of the forest

name: ann_glados_ally_pos_24
text: So that's a minor victory, right square in the middle of all your failures.
text_simple: so thats a minor victory right square in the middle of all your failures

name: ann_glados_ally_pos_26
text: Let's be honest: it probably won't help.
text_simple: lets be honest it probably wont help

name: ann_glados_ally_pos_27
text: For all the good it will do you.
text_simple: for all the good it will do you

name: ann_glados_ally_pos_28
text: If you had any idea what you were doing, this would be a real achievement.
text_simple: if you had any idea what you were doing this would be a real achievement

name: ann_glados_ally_pos_29
text: By accident, if I had to guess.
text_simple: by accident if i had to guess

name: ann_glados_ally_pos_30
text: Did you win? I don't have the first clue what's happening right now. What about those things? The tree-people things. Are they important?
text_simple: did you win i dont have the first clue whats happening right now what about those things the treepeople things are they important

name: ann_glados_ally_pos_31
text: You're winning. More accurately, you're on the same team as winners who happen to be near you while they win. Anyway, congratulations.
text_simple: youre winning more accurately youre on the same team as winners who happen to be near you while they win anyway congratulations

name: ann_glados_ally_pos_34
text: That's funny, I didn't even see you cheat.
text_simple: thats funny i didnt even see you cheat

name: ann_glados_ally_pos_38
text: That should delay the inevitable slightly.
text_simple: that should delay the inevitable slightly

name: ann_glados_ally_pos_39
text: Let's be honest: it probably won't help.
text_simple: lets be honest it probably wont help

name: ann_glados_exitgame_01
text: Based on the way you've been playing, I understand.
text_simple: based on the way youve been playing i understand

name: ann_glados_followup_respaw_01
text: Oh good. You're back.
text_simple: oh good youre back

name: ann_glados_followup_respaw_02
text: Oh, you were gone. Because nobody noticed.
text_simple: oh you were gone because nobody noticed

name: ann_glados_followup_respaw_03
text: You're back. That's... great.
text_simple: youre back thats great

name: ann_glados_followup_respaw_04
text: You're going to break that respawner using it so much. It wasn't built for this kind of traffic.
text_simple: youre going to break that respawner using it so much it wasnt built for this kind of traffic

name: ann_glados_followup_respaw_05
text: I hope you bought the fire gauntlets of strength goblet boots. I don't understand any of this.
text_simple: i hope you bought the fire gauntlets of strength goblet boots i dont understand any of this

name: ann_glados_followup_respaw_06
text: You again.
text_simple: you again

name: ann_glados_followup_respaw_07
text: Your terrifying reign of dying continues.
text_simple: your terrifying reign of dying continues

name: ann_glados_followup_respaw_08
text: Well, see you back here soon.
text_simple: well see you back here soon

name: ann_glados_followup_respaw_09
text: Just because we can bring you back from the dead doesn't mean you can't dodge occasionally.
text_simple: just because we can bring you back from the dead doesnt mean you cant dodge occasionally

name: ann_glados_followup_respaw_13
text: I thought you were dead. I'll let everybody who was worried about you know-okay I'm done.
text_simple: i thought you were dead ill let everybody who was worried about you knowokay im done

name: ann_glados_followup_respaw_14
text: Oh, you're back from whatever idiotic afterlife your preposterous race believes in.
text_simple: oh youre back from whatever idiotic afterlife your preposterous race believes in

name: ann_glados_followup_respaw_16
text: Get back to battle. I think there's still a spot of ground out there that doesn't have your blood on it.
text_simple: get back to battle i think theres still a spot of ground out there that doesnt have your blood on it

name: ann_glados_followup_respaw_17
text: They struck you down, but you've come back stronger! Wait, I'm sorry. I meant heavier. In the face. Anyway, waddle out there and do your best.
text_simple: they struck you down but youve come back stronger wait im sorry i meant heavier in the face anyway waddle out there and do your best
